title: Ola says it will acquire financial services firm Avail Finance - Economic Times
content:
1. Ola says it will acquire financial services firm Avail Finance  Economic Times
  2. Ola to acquire Avail Finance  Times of India
  3. Olaâ€™s Avail Finance acquisition may have to go through an independent audit  Business Today
  4. Ola to buy fintech firm Avail Finance to strengthen financial services biz  Mint
  5. Ola to acquire Bhavish Aggarwal's brother-led company Avail Finance  Entrackr
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The $50 million share swap deal will give Avail Finances founder Ankush Aggarwal, the brother of Ola chief executive Bhavish Aggarwal, a stake in Olas parent entity ANI Technologies, three people aware of the deal told ET.
